EXAMPLES.TITLE: Frontend Developer
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: Metadata S.L - Valencia, Spain
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Contributed to the creation of a component package using React, designed to be used across different epics by multiple teams. The components were documented and visualized in Storybook. Designed and structured screens. Achieved 95% test coverage through end-to-end testing with Cypress. Validated and documented errors following Agile methodologies in Jira and Bitbucket, optimizing the incident resolution workflow. Collaborated with development and design teams to review and enhance UI components, ensuring high fidelity to Figma designs.

EXAMPLES.TITLE: Frontend Developer - Valencia, Spain
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: Bigdogs
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Developed web interfaces using React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Framer Motion. Reduced the agreed-upon development quota with the team by introducing reusable components and customizing elements using Next.js and Chakra UI. Create animations and interactivity using Framer Motion, enhancing the user experience.
